name: Acute Gastroenteritis
chief_complaint: I've been having diarrhea and vomiting since yesterday
physical_findings: normal vital signs except slight tachycardia
prognosis: excellent with full recovery expected within 2-3 days with proper hydration
description: A common inflammatory condition of the digestive system caused by viral infection, resulting in gastric and intestinal inflammation with associated dehydration risk
risk_factors: recent consumption of contaminated food or water
